Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, will stay again!”
Reviews.Author: roses4rachx3
Reviews.Content: My bf and I stayed here for 2 nights, 3 days and it was great! I got a great deal as well as a voucher each day per person for the sea bay cafe. What a cool deal! I usually rather stay in hotels with a continental breakfast but with the vouchers, we could get breakfast there daily. It was small but very good. The hotel was spacious and the staff was friendly. Our room was on the top floor which i liked very much. The room was large and clean. Great outdoor pool! Will return! Stayed last year. Summer 2011.

Reviews.Title: “Definitely a good choice”
Reviews.Author: GoNordiquesGo
Reviews.Content: This was our second time in OC, and the other hotel we stayed at the previous year was booked. So we found the SeaBay and read the reviews on TripAdvisor, and finally decided to book there for a 4 nights stay. The hotel is conveniently located in OC, just a block from the beach. We checked in early and were surprised to have our room ready. By the way, the ladies at the front desk are just great. We got to our room and inspected as usual. The furniture was somewhat worned out, but OK. The carpet seemed humid, as if the A/C was not that efficient. We had a bayview balcony, which was very nice to have breakfast and afternoon time on. During the first night, we had trouble sleeping because of disturbing guests, but were so tired after our day of travelling that we did sleep anyway. The next day, I went to front desk to mention about these guests, and the lady told us with a convincing voice to call them whenever we were getting disturbed and that security would take care of the situation. I was very pleased by the answer, and even if we did not call the second night as noise was not too bad, someone went to warn the room beside ours to be more quiet, which we did appreciate. Overall, very great stay, in a greatly located hotel. The SeaBay cafe beside the hotel was a good place to eat breakfast and lunch. I would definitely recommend this hotel. If you get disturbed, call the front desk right away, they will take care of that!

Reviews.Title: “EXCELLENT TOP NOTCH”
Reviews.Author: Lyn60
Reviews.Content: Stayed from 9/3-9/6 2012. Took advantage of the special King/King room rate. Lots of room in the bed and in the room. Everything was clean and comfortable. Water temp for shower was great (no fluctuations) and shower head was exceptionally powerful. Bathroom was a little small and no sink outside of the bathroom. Sufficient electrical plugs. Room smelled clean & fresh each time we entered. Balcony was very nice...could see Bay, Ocean, and watch the tennis players next door. Definitely have to eat in the Sea Bay Cafe...very clean and efficient. All the girls are very friendly and accomodating. Food was excellent...not one complaint. Check in/out was friendly and quick. Outside pool was extremely clean and inviting. Lots of chairs, tables and beautiful potted plants. Maintenance men were also very friendly. Only wished the walk to the beach had been a little shorter but it was OK. This HOTEL is #1 in my book for a great Ocean City vacation/getaway. Will definitely stay here again. Booked a second room for my parents and they put them right next to us. Their room was also King/King and just as nice. We all had a great time here. Give it a try...you won't be sorry and if you are-- you are the EXCEPTION. All of the reviews I read before booking were pretty much on target...yes the towels need updated as does the carpet but overall everything was great.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and price”
Reviews.Author: Karjan83
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for 6 nights in the double king room. The room was clean and very spacious. The location was great and there is a bus stop right outside the hotel. We ate breakfast in the seabay cafe the food was good but a little pricey for breakfast. The pool was nice and clean. The staff was all very friendly and helpful when needed. I would defiantly recommend this hotel and will be staying here again

Reviews.Title: “Nice Place”
Reviews.Author: PATraverler
Reviews.Content: We spent one night here. The hotel was reasonable and nice. The location is good too. We had a bay front room and the view was incredible, especially the sunset. We had a problem with our lock when we arrived, but Mario took care of it in about 5 minutes. The only problem is that they allow smoking on the balcony and the people below us were chain smokers. We could not go out on our balcony until they went out because the smoke waifed up to our balcony. That would be the only thing to keep me from staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel, clean and comfortable”
Reviews.Author: SwannTraveller
Reviews.Content: We were looking for a reasonably-priced, clean and comfortable hotel in Ocean City near Seacrets and found just the thing! The Sea Bay was reasonably priced, and had all the amenities we were looking for. We stayed in a deluxe king bay-view room with a balcony overlooking the bay, with gorgeous sunsets. Bathroom was very clean and nice, and the bed we had was extremely comfortable. We went with two other friends, and had requested rooms near each other. We were pleasantly surprised to find out we had rooms next door to each other, with adjoining doors! We went for a swim in the small pool, again overlooking the bay. Lovely time. The location is great, convenient from the bridge and near Mackey's, Seacrets and the beach. Would definitely stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Nice place and location”
Reviews.Author: alcornm33
Reviews.Content: My husband and I decided to go away for a last min anniversary weekend. Trying to stay within a reasonable budget we booked at the Seabay Hotel. We were both very pleased. When we arrived check in was quick and the staff were very helpful and friendly. We were also surprised with an upgraded bay front room and a sand bucket filled with ice, champagne and champagne glasses for our anniversary. I thought that just added a personal touch that made the first impression a memorable one. The room was spacious, the hotel and the pool were clean. The location is also great. Its across from Dead Freddie's, close to Seacrets and one block away from the beach. We had a great time and i would definitely stay at Seabay again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place, walking distance to Seacrets & Fagers Island”
Reviews.Author: deshanko
Reviews.Content: Its a nice place to stay. Clean with a good location. I've been here before and I'll stay here again. Everyone at the front desk was helpful and friendly. Good value. Stay here and you won't be disappointed.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay Hotel”
Reviews.Author: VAvisitors
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a quick 2 night stay and the hotel was perfect for us. The hotel was very clean. There was a pool there but we didn't get a chance to use it, since we were there mainly for the beach. From the hotel, it is a quick, easy walk to the beach. We ate breakfast both mornings at the Sea Bay Cafe, located right in the hotel. Reasonably priced and the food was great. It was packed every morning, so that is a good sign.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect spot”
Reviews.Author: Harvlom
Reviews.Content: We were undecided as to where to stay here in Ocean City. We have stayed in the more expensive hotels uptown and we did not feel like paying all that again. Luckily I did some checking and found the Sea Bay. The location was perfect and we enjoyed the view of the bay and the city from our balcony. The room was huge, the bathrooms were clean and the service was excellent. You can tell they try very hard to keep the property in good shape. The front desk people were very helpful and friendly. The prices were very fair for everything they provide. We will definitely return. We can't wait until next summer.

Reviews.Title: “SeaBay Yeah!”
Reviews.Author: jackcurry57
Reviews.Content: Excellent time at the Seabay Hotel. Perfect location... right near Rt 90 Bridge entrance and exit to ocean city at 60th street Heart of town. Very friendly staff ... made us feel welcome each day of our vacation. Dined at Seabay Cafe on first floor numerous times and was very convenient and excellent local flavor. Made friends with Chef Billy .. Played tennis across the street and strolled to Fagers Island on the bay a few times for sunset cocktails nitely. Lots to do within walking distance. Hotel was clean and professional and the beach is 200 yards across ocean highway...but being on the bayside we got some spectacular sunsets. Enjoyed feeding the ducks with the kids.... 2 pools were nice also. Will see you next year for a rerun ! JC Shaler , Pa

Reviews.Title: “Great location, but smells like cat urine”
Reviews.Author: nikkig21
Reviews.Content: My family and I planned a weeks vacation in OCMD. Last minute we decided to leave late the night before to avoid traffic. The closest hotel, and hotel with vacancies, to our already booked hotel for the week, was Sea Bay. We read mixed reviews on tripadvisor but figured one night couldn't hurt. There have been many occasions when we've read poor reviews for other resorts/ hotels and have still had a great experience. Unfortunately, that was not the case at SB. The staff was nice and and accommodating, but the room was terrible. I am not sure if this is all rooms or just ours but there was an overpowering smell of cat pee right when you entered. It was quite humid, the floors were damp, and furniture all moist. We would have preferred the air already on in order to prevent the humidity, but again we wouldn't normally complain. Except, once the air was put on, it still didn't work. It was mostly a fan. Long story short. Our experience was not worth the money paid, and we were uncomfortable all night. Thank god we had already booked another hotel,because if our vacation was spent in the room we were given at SB it would have been a disaste.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for the price”
Reviews.Author: ebonyclarkgriswold
Reviews.Content: The Sea Bay was a great place to stay for the price. I read a lot of reviews about the hotel and i was alittle skeptical, but this place gets an 8 on scale of 1 - 10. The proximity of the hotel to the beach andd main highway are excellent. The room was clean and spacious enough to accommodate a family of six at no extra charge. The staff was polite and helpful. I did not hear any noise from other rooms. I would recommend this hotel to families traveling with young children.

Reviews.Title: “Clean & professional!”
Reviews.Author: Scheiner62
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend & I wanted to get away for a few days without spending a lot of money but wanted a clean, nice place to stay. They bent over backwards to get us into a room that was most fitting for us for the best price. Just that little bit of extra effort went a long day. We were only there for two days but even the cafe they have attached to the hotel was warm & inviting. The girls working there treated us as if we were regulars & the service was amazing. The rooms are a bit outdated but I would take the cleanliness & impeccable service over a flat screen tv any day. It was quite a pleasant surprise & we will surely be returning. Thank you Sea Bay for making our short few days of vacation truly memorable!

Reviews.Title: “Over Night Stay”
Reviews.Author: David G
Reviews.Content: Room was spacious and clean. Had a great view of the bay and sunset. Location was ideal, close to 90 street bridge and easy access to transportation and beach. Only there for one night but would look to book again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Convenience and Kindness”
Reviews.Author: Michele P
Reviews.Content: The hotel is conveniently located off of the Route 90 Bridge. Upon arrival, I inquired if there was a room I could store my triathlon bike; I was introduced to Moe. I showed him where I parked and he said there are security cameras in the lot and he was on duty until 5am so he would watch over my vehicle as he entered/exited the hotel. The hotel was nice and quiet, the beds were very comfortable. Friends and I ate in the restaurant on the first floor. The food was served quickly and was very good. Overall, we had a wonderful experience in customer service, security, as well as a restful stay. I highly recommend the establishment!

Reviews.Title: “Very Reasonable Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: fitness121
Reviews.Content: What a great place to stay for a great price! The rooms were clean and comfortable and close to many many things. The outdoor deck and pool by the east building was very comfortable. Spent every evening out there relaxing. The hotel was one block from the beach. The employees were very friendly and helpful. We will stay there again when we visit OC. There was also a small fridge, microwave, one cup coffee maker inside the room. There was also a breakfast and lunch cafe inside the hotel. The food was very good and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Debra P
Reviews.Content: What a great place. Staff was wonderful and also helpful with what every we needed.Clean rooms, nice place to eat too. also very family frendly. Easy on and off interstate.Would go back their again.We were their at the end of July to Aug Debbie Petrosky

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in OC”
Reviews.Author: Tina M
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an affordable place to stay in OC, than this hotel is a good choice. It is conveniently located off the Rt. 90 bridge. The rooms have always been clean and and comfy. There is a wonderful restaurant off the lobby for breakfast (try the homemade sausage). :) The staff has always been helpful and accomodating. The spacious room had Wi-Fi along with a fridge.

Reviews.Title: “Amazing stay!!”
Reviews.Author: Snooop444
Reviews.Content: Couldn't have been happier with our stay at the Sea Bay Hotel. The staff is more than accommodating and went above and beyond to make sure we had a wonderful weekend. The hotel is close to fun places to go out and eat at too. Rooms were very clean, nice, and exactly what we needed for a weekend at the beach. Not to mention the Sea Bay Cafe's food....so nice to be able to come off the beach and relax with some great food. We'll definitely be staying here again!

Reviews.Title: “Poor-Average Stay...”
Reviews.Author: Lisa L
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at this hotel from July 14-16th. We signed up for a remodeled room in the East building with a private balcony (which we didn't get). The room was ok, but did not look like it was recently remodeled. The bathroom definitely wasn't as their was mold/mildew on the faucet. Glad I brought our own washcloths and towels, because their's was thin, coarse and worn out from too many uses. The hallway was dark and musty. Front Desk and Sea Bay Cafe service was good. The pool was clean. Hotel location good. Would not recommend for families with children, as it's hard to sleep at night because of the drunken, loud late nighters. Would we stay here again??? Most likely not.

Reviews.Title: “Dirtiest room we've ever stayed in.”
Reviews.Author: bassin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed in this hotel for three nights the week of July 16th. Walked in the room and there were scuff marks all over the walls the carpet was very wrinkled and in need of re-stretching, paint was coming off the wood trim, the outside balcony floor was covered in stains and dirt. There were even blood stains on the adjoining room door. We checked travel advisor before booking thinking this was a nice place. It was not. We will never stay there again nor would we recommend it to anyone. All we got was an appology from the front desk.

Reviews.Title: “West Building YUK!!!! MJ”
Reviews.Author: Mike P
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel of July 18-22. I was placed in the west building which faced the bay. Upon entering the building on my floor the hallways were gross... I thought that I was in a dungeon......As I entered the room, I noticed that the room lacked any of the amenities. The room was very basic... No pictures on the wall... Old bathroom.... Beds were uncomfortable....I actually thought about leaving... But the room/bathroom was extremely clean.... and there were no signs of bedbugs.... So we stayed... The views from the balcony was excellent... and the pools were very clean... Our housekeeper was excellent and friendly!!!!! My friend's family stay in the main building which was much nicer..... So if you are going to stay at the Sea Bay Hotel ask for the main building..... Overall we enjoyed the proximity to the beach..... But would not stay in the west building again....

Reviews.Title: “Great time!”
Reviews.Author: xBre2007x
Reviews.Content: Although this hotel does not get the best reviews, I always have an excellent experience. I have stayed there about five times now. The rooms are always clean, the staff is friendly and the rooms are at a reasonable price considering how expensive many in the area are. Although it definitely isn't the fanciest or up to date, consider how much you are paying. I am very pleased for the price. I stayed there for a week with my fiance and when we first got in our room, we didn't have a table since we booked a queen sized bed room. I didn't realize this when I booked. I called down to the front desk and they immediately brought me up a folding table and two chairs so we could make lunch in our room. I was very pleased with how accommodating they were. They also recently got new refrigerators and microwaves. The two pools were never very crowded and it is just a short walk to the beach and to many restaurants. Also a short walk to Fager's Island bar and Seacrets, which was very convenient for my fiance and I as we are younger and wanted to be able to go out without driving. I will be staying again next year as well. The Sea Bay never disappoints.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, convenient to beach and nice bay front view.”
Reviews.Author: Amy T
Reviews.Content: I chose a bay front room in the WEST building. My friends had a "Bay view" and were in the east building - if you craned your neck, you could, in fact, see a sliver of the bay from their balcony. My bay view was very lovely. Clean. No bed bugs. Average furnishings. Bed not too soft, but leaning that way (I tend to like a firm mattress). Extra pillows and blankets provided. Refridgerator, microwave & coffee maker in every room was nice feature. Appliances were clean and worked well.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, big rooms, great staff and view of the bay”
Reviews.Author: Howard S
Reviews.Content: My family of four stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel for a quick getaway to the beach. What a great move. Our boys loved the pool and the close access to the beach. We loved the fresh clean room and plenty of room to keep the boys calm. The room was spotless. Beds more comfortable than expected. What separated the Sea Bay for us was staff. From the moment we walked in the lobby, we felt at home. The warmth and dedication of the staff won us over. Sea Bay Cafe continued the positive experience. We skipped breakfast to hit the beach early. Lunch was delicious. My wife is a more picky eater than I. She was very impressed with the large fresh salad. All of our meals were fresh, delicious and well priced. We will certainly be back.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place”
Reviews.Author: Basoul
Reviews.Content: Nice place for family vacation big room nice vue and lot of fun and activities for children

Reviews.Title: “Big Rooms”
Reviews.Author: liz34043
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel and the rooms were really big, good size balconies, nice pool, great location and a restaurant on the first floor with a great breakfast at a decent price.

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced for What you Get”
Reviews.Author: grover1959
Reviews.Content: First I should say, I am not a fan of Ocean City. It's extremely crowded, congested and not my idea of an ideal beach getaway. That said, there are tons of hotels in OC and it's hard to find a decent one. I booked this based on TripAdvisor reviews since I was attending a wedding at the beach. To be fair, the hotel was clean, and the front desk staff were friendly and attentive. The rooms however are very dated. The beds are old, as is the carpet, the TV, pretty much everything in the room needs updating. There were a lot of young partiers staying in the hotel so noise was an issue. At $200.00 a night, I expect nicer, newer furnishings. My guess is, based on the demographics of guests, they don't put a lot of money into new beds, furniture, etc. as there are a lot of young partiers. That said, i don't know where you find a quality hotel in OC. I did appreciate the fact that the place was clean and staff pleasant. Otherwise, not a place I would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Great service, great location!”
Reviews.Author: Mazzola8879
Reviews.Content: We stayed on a Saturday night and had a great experience. The staff at the service desk were friendly and helpfully. There is plenty of parking, a clean pool and a cafe on site. We stayed in a 5th floor room that faced south and had excellent views of the strip and the bey. Many of the hotels in oc require a 2 night stay on summer weekends, this is one of the few places that offers 1 night stays. Excellent choice if you are staying for the nightlife, as it is a short walk to Fagers, Mackys, and Seacrets.

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Justin6212
Reviews.Content: Close to Seacrets, Fagers, Dead Freddys, 7-11 and the beach Diner on first floor Pool outside Average hotel for OCMD, nothing special

Reviews.Title: “AMAZING STAY!!!”
Reviews.Author: Wannatravelmur
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough about this hotel so I'll try to sum it up. I booked this hotel for Sat May 12-Mon May 14 for our 1st yr anniversary. Upon arrival Seana gave us a cute little pale with champage and glasses. Real glasses, not plastic! There was a cute "Happy Anniversary" poster made for us as well. Ok, so we go to our room and it was perfect! The room was spotless and fresh. Our reservation was even upgraded. I booked a room with double beds but we were given a king sized bed with jacuzzi, for the first night. The jacuzzi was clean, our bathroom was clean and we were oh so happy to be there! For the second night we had a king sized bed with a pull-out sofa bed, and a private balcony. That room was newly renovated and seemed bigger than the first. In each bathroom were soaps, shampoo, conditioner and really nice make-up remover pads. The shower head/water pressure was thee best part of the hotel stay!!! WOW the shower was like love. I didn't want to get out. Ahh just thinking about it makes me want to book another trip now. LOL Seana and Jessica gave us a lot of tips about where to eat, what to see and do and their suggestions were dead on. We didnt have enough time for everything so we'll have to take another trip down very soon. The hotel is located right off the highway but not really close to the boardwalk. I didnt care as it was one block over from the beach, I had my guy with me so that was really all that mattered to me. The weather was great, I felt loved and it was a perfect weekend. I'd like to do this weekend over and over as ground hog's day : ) It was a little chilly this weekend so we didnt get in the pool but we did sit at the pool for a few minutes. The pool area was clean and the pool looked inviting. The other ladies at the front desk Aubrey, Shelley, and Jessica were great as well. Justin and I look forward to visiting next year for our anniversary. Thank you Sea Bay Hotel and a special thank you to Seana!!!

Reviews.Title: “Room with a view”
Reviews.Author: Lonna H
Reviews.Content: My husband and i were in ocean city for a birthday party weekend for a friend. Our checkin was quick and easy, our room was very clean, and had a great view of the bay. The hotel was close to the two restaraunt/bars we attend and easy to get to route 90 to get home.

Reviews.Title: “2ND YEAR IN A ROW I HAD NICE STAY AT SEA BAY”
Reviews.Author: eric41365
Reviews.Content: I was in ocean city for a golf weekend and stayed over on friday nite. Room was clean,quiet, and check in was quick and friendly. Once again being so close to quality restaurants and nitelife i could walk around and enjoy myself. Breakfast at their cafe the next morning added a nice touch.Service and food was superb. i would recommend this property!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant surprise”
Reviews.Author: R B
Reviews.Content: Booked a corner king room with a great view of the bay, rt 90 and coastal highway for Easter weekend. Check in was easy. Staff was very welcoming and friendly. Room was quite spacious. Had a sofa/bed in corner, sink, frig, and table inside door. Spacious bathroom. We were very pleasantly surprised by the size of the room...and the price was very reasonable too! We will definitely stay here again and recommend to our friends.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay Shines Again”
Reviews.Author: dctravel9
Reviews.Content: Another great and friendly experience at the Sea Bay. The staff and rooms continue to excel in all aspects.

Reviews.Title: “Great customer service”
Reviews.Author: Mary K
Reviews.Content: Recently had a weekend stay at the Sea Bay Hotel. Was pleasantly suprised at the size of the room. All the staff we came in contact with were terrific! From the moment we walked in they made us feel comfortable. I would definately consider staying there again. Unfortunately we did not try the cafe. The only thing I missed was an ocean view.

Reviews.Title: “Very Good place for good price”
Reviews.Author: Rick21234
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean and staff was very friendly. One block from the beach. Good coffee shop for breakfast with nice wait staff.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay Ocean City, MD”
Reviews.Author: Slainte2
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for an inexpensive, centally located hotel, this is a great spot. Wi Fi in room. Staff were attentive, restaurant adjacent open in winter, and easy in and out access. Great stay for the money.

Reviews.Title: “Pics do no justice...great trip”
Reviews.Author: tdoug12
Reviews.Content: This was not only my first visit to OC and staying so close to the beach but my first stay at this hotel. I wasn't to excited about it after looking at the pics on-line but after checking in we were very pleased. The location was great, you are located right on a great strip where there are several restaurants, shops, bars, and everything you need. You are also a short walk across the street from the beach which is perfect for parking. The parking lot was a negative it was very small on the side and we often had to park on the street which was annoying since all the signs say no parking. The grounds were clean and bright however again if entering from the side trying to get your luggage cart up the ramp is a nightmare. The corners are to small and it took 2 staff members and myself to get it up the ramp. The lobby is nice and big its loaded with attraction info which is great. The staff was pleasant and friendly also very helpful. After checking in they gave all the children a free shovel and pale set which they absolutely loved. The room was great, clean and the bed was comfortably. We had a balcony which we enjoyed and the bathroom and mini kitchen area was clean and nice. The restaurant at the hotel proved to be our favorite. great prices and good food. The kids loved the pool and out side area all though i wish there were more area with shade or umbrellas while sitting down but overall it was ok. Me and my family were very pleased and will deff stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Great off season bargain”
Reviews.Author: Denny G
Reviews.Content: I imagine this place is a good deal anytime but it seemed especially so in early October. I went for the cheapest room available which meant the lowest floor in the building furthest from the ocean beach on the side away from the bay. But even this room had a little balcony from which the ocean could be glimpsed between other buildings and the beach was a short walk away. The room itself was nicely equipped, clean, and comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Nicely-priced room but that's about it”
Reviews.Author: Eric C
Reviews.Content: My family stayed for two nights at the Sea Bay Hotel. The room was well priced and if no issues had come up, I imagine we would have left there thinking it was a nice place. However, issues did come up and they were addressed poorl\y. First, we booked through Travelocity, which said the hotel stay included a breakfast. When we walked over to the cafe for the breakfast, we were told by the front desk that Travelocity was wrong and that only people who book through the hotel's own website get the breakfast. I imagine the front desk is used to this unresolved ongoing issue, but we are not. We were treated as if we were stupid to even ask about getting free breakfast without paying for a room via the hotel's web site. I suggest the Sea Bay get this issue sorted out with Travelocity because it leads to misunderstandings. Second, the walls on our floor were paper thin. This was more of a problem for the people next to us, who I felt badly for, because we had a sick baby that would occasionally scream early in the morning. Since I could hear word for word conversations in the next room over, lord help those people who had to put up with crying at 6am. Third, I clogged the toilet. It happens - I did my best to resolve the issue myself, but without a plunger, it wasn't gonna happen. I called the front desk on Saturday afternoon to get it addressed, and by Sunday at checkout, no one had come. I used the elevator to go down and tell them about it on Sunday, but the elevator door got stuck on the ground floor and would only open enough for me to get an arm out. So I went back up to my floor (luckily the doors opened on other floors) and we simply told them at checkout, where they didn't seem at all interested or apologetic that no one came. On the plus side, the hotel is right across the street from a nice section of beach, we had a room in the back building that was overlooking the bay and my son got to watch a bunch of ducks feed and fight with each other, and the people staying there all seemed very nice. The pools looked like they were in good shape too but we didn't go in. A mixed bag.

Reviews.Title: “Yet another good expierence at the Sea Bay Inn”
Reviews.Author: bingo42
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at the Sea Bay Inn for more years than I can remember. Over that time this hotel has offered comfort at a reasonable price every time. A few years ago new ownership took over and IMO nothing but positive changes have followed. Again over the weekend of Winefest I was met by a friendly, professional staff at every turn. My room was clean, quiet, offered free internet, and mini-fridge. The mid-town location is excellent for getting to many places to either eat or have a few drinks at night. Fager's Island, Hall's, Dough Roller, BJ's and several other places are within easy walking distance. The Sea Bay also offers breakfast and lunch food service located right on the property in their own cafe. I had breakfast there Sunday morning and the food was well prepared, the staff was helpful and friendly and the prices certainly in line with your other OC options. All in all the management of this property is doing a fine job both maintaining and improving the property. I would hope they would contniue in this direction for years to come. It has always been a welcome pleasure arriving in OC and checking in at the Sea Bay Inn. Like returning back to stay with friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great Experience”
Reviews.Author: allison g
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel for Labor Day weekend. We had a great time there and loved all of the employees there. Because of the gorgeous weather we didn't spend much time in our room at all. Upon arrival they notified us we would be in the back building which is nice because it is further away from the street and all the lobby commotion that may occur. We spent one day at our pool at our building and we were the only people there - it was great! Our room was clean and sheets and bathroom were also clean. Room service was very good at coming late in the mornings to make the beds and clean up. I am 25 and was with my boyfriend so it was perfect for a young couple - not sure I would recommend older couples or largers families who might be annoyed with people coming and going frequently. We didn't mind though! Also great location.. bus stop is right in front of the hotel and the beach is about a block away. Sea bay cafe is a great spot for breakfast - as far as JRS ribs across the street I wouldn't recommend it at all! Terrible food there. We also ate at Dead Freddies which is a short walk down the street - good food and good wings! Just ask the front desk where the good places to eat are and they will point in the right direction.

Reviews.Title: “Another pleasant experience”
Reviews.Author: LJ E
Reviews.Content: This was our second stay at this hotel. We found the hotel very clean again. All of the hotel staff were gracious and helpful. The pool area was nice and the pool clean. Every morning we had our breakfast at the hotel cafe which was very good. Waitresses and kitchen staff were also nice and friendly. Another pleasant experience..

Reviews.Title: “Good Value Hotel”
Reviews.Author: berniecohen
Reviews.Content: Booked through Hotels.com. Was the least expensive by far, but had a preponderance of favorable reviews; rated four stars, which was accurate. Very large rooms, pleasant staff, including housekeeping. The Cafe for breakfast is ok, but after eating at a breakfast buffet, might just as well eat in the Cafe. Food overall is a challenge in Ocean City. (The Crabcake Factory is good, worth 3 to 3.5 stars). Food is very touristy, as is the whole town, exemplified by schlock. We usually stay in Rehoboth, DE, which we will return to in the future. Good food, real boutiques, etc. It's worth the extra expense. The hotel has two buildings, Bay & Street side. If book through the web,you get streetside, but get hthere early and ask for a Bay side. Each building has a side that faces the parking lot. Request the Bay or Street side.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay. Great Location. Clean. Ok beds.”
Reviews.Author: musicallover93
Reviews.Content: Admittedly, the Sea Bay Hotel was our second choice for a hotel at OCMD. We reserved a room for two nights in the Bayside building. This property is definetely on the older side, but the management is obviously making good improvements! Check-in was fast, simple and easy. The room was clean, and even on the second day, we walked in and it smelled clean. Now to the cons: The pool was a little small and a tile was cracked along the edge, but that can't really be fix in the season anyway. Also, the beds were a little on the small side, and kinda uncomfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay at the Sea Bay”
Reviews.Author: PA_Traveler_7
Reviews.Content: My wife and I enjoyed our stay at the Sea Bay. We liked the very close proximity to the beach (one block), the view of the bay from the balcony was great, and the cafe was nice for breakfast. The hotel and our room were clean and the grounds were well kept. Two points to make for first time visitors - this is an older hotel that has been renovated, so don't expect anything ultra-modern about the facility. Also, you will likely need to drive to be in the heart of the boardwalk "action"... this hotel is on 61st St - most boardwalk activity is below about 19th Street. That said, there are plenty of restaurants, shops, etc. near the hotel. One nice place in particular was Fager's Island, a popular on-the-bay restaurant / nightspot. While many cars jockeyed for parking at that facility, it was nice to just walk there...we had a very nice dinner, outside, overlooking the bay. Overall, Sea Bay a good value for a beach town.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service, Great Value, Great Time!”
Reviews.Author: B_C392
Reviews.Content: There's several things that make the Sea Bay Hotel a great vacation spot. They've got everything needed to make the vacation easy including a Cafe downstairs that serves some awesome breakfast items (the crab omelette secret sauce and chip-beef omelette were great). Service is great, sheets, towels, etc. are clean. They gave the kids some sand toys which got them excited to head to the beach. And I love the fact this hotel is literally the first right turn after coming off the bridge on highway 90. No fighting traffic and traffic lights. It's close to Fager's Island which was great for dinner and pretty happening after-hours too.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great 2 night stay & great Sea-Doo trip”
Reviews.Author: mikeyanderson2
Reviews.Content: The staff was friendly & the rm was clean !!! Idid enjoy my breakfast @ the cafe !!!

Reviews.Title: “Roaches, Roaches, Roaches”
Reviews.Author: Leese216
Reviews.Content: I have been coming to Ocean City for 20 years and my family and I have stayed in a couple of different hotels. We always had an enjoyable stay, until now. The beginning of our stay was pleasant, the hotel staff was friendly, and the rooms were sizable compared to other hotels. Although there were only 2 drawers in the dresser, it wasn't a big inconvenience. The air conditioner worked well and the shower was awesome. However, all that pales in comparison to seeing not one, but TWO roaches in our kitchen area after returning home one night. I called the front desk, and the employee who came up was nice, and after talking a while, one of the roaches decided to pop out again, so he can confirm we saw them. Now, I have never seen roaches, in any housing establishment. I lived in the suburbs outside NYC for the entirety of my life, went to school in the city, and for this to happen was truly disheartening and disturbing. We spoke to the manager of the hotel the next morning and while she was apologetic, I did not sense any sincerity. She attempted to tell us that they've never had that problem before, and tried to blame it on previous customers bringing them in via other avenues. I am not an idiot and I was offended by her condescension AND her only refunding a fraction of our money for our troubles. She was not accommodating by any means. Rest assured that if there are ALREADY 2 roaches in our room, ON THE THIRD FLOOR IN THE MIDDLE OF THE HALLWAY, there are certainly more. Do not stay here. It is SO not worth it.

Reviews.Title: “annual beach trip”
Reviews.Author: Luci B
Reviews.Content: Stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel again for our annual family Beach Trip...as usual, the stay was a pleasant one. Staff always very professional and family friendly. They provide excellent service, clean facilities all at an affordable price.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the View”
Reviews.Author: Ann W
Reviews.Content: My husband and I just spent four relaxing days at Sea Bay. Despite it being a last minute get-away we could not have been happier with our choice. Our room had a gorgeous view of the bay, the bed was comfortable the room was clean and inviting. Shelly at the front desk was polite and professional and full of suggestions for where to eat and things to do. Breakfast is our vacation splurge, we had breakfast at the Cafe each morning and were very happy with the selection and quality, he got his eggs and sausage and I got to eat healthy. I enjoyed reading my book lounging by the pool, the water was crystal clear and it was a nice break from the beach. We met one of the owners in the hall, he asked us if we were having a good visit to OC and told us about his favorite place for ice cream . It is easy to see the pride that the owners take in this hotel, it is attractive, clean, the staff is friendly and you feel welcome here. We will be back

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for its price!!!!”
Reviews.Author: bungee1
Reviews.Content: Everything was great, the rooms were clean, the meals in their restaurant delicious, the swimming pool was very clean. The beach is very close to the hotel and there are lots of supermarkets and restaurants near by. I think that the only thing that is missing is a lifeguard on the pool so the kids wont jump and dive in it, but except for that we loved it and we recommend it to everyone who wants great stay in non expensive but great hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Beach Vacation”
Reviews.Author: JIR_9
Reviews.Content: My wife, son and I stayed at the Sea Bay for 5 nights in August and had a wonderful time. The hotel provided everything we needed, continuous air conditioning as it was very warm, comfortable beds, VERY quiet, clean rooms and a 3 minute walk to the beach. For the price you can't go wrong, we would definitely stay there again if and when we return to Ocean City

Reviews.Title: “Just alright for a couple days--very noisy”
Reviews.Author: kelcarib
Reviews.Content: Stayed 2 nights while visiting friends in OC for the week. Walls very thin, you can hear everything in the next room even regular conversation, water running etc. Basic room, good enough for a couple days, wouldn't stay longer since it's too loud. Fireworks rocked the place from 9 to 10 pm on Sunday night, at least we were awake still. Walking distance to shops and food. Ample parking.

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean/Great Location”
Reviews.Author: rossell1
Reviews.Content: As the title says, Located at the intersection for Coastal Hwy and 90 and very clean. We had a king size room that was very spacious and faced the Hwy. If we return to OC and stay here we would opt for a smaller room facing the bay just for a more relaxing scenic view. Very close(walking Distance) to the big three bars, Mackys-Seacrets-Fagers Island- 10 min bike ride to top of board walk, 30 min bike ride to sunset grill. Rooms need updating but they keep them very very clean. Good value for money(got the AAA rate) they didnt ask for our card at check in........wink ,wink :)

Reviews.Title: “I was very pleased with our stay at Sea Bay.”
Reviews.Author: NYyankeefan54
Reviews.Content: I can't say enough good things about our stay here. The room was very clean. The bathroom was spotless. Our deck overlooked the large pool area which was fun to watch the people enjoy their water time. I also enjoyed the pool which is kept very clean. The room came equipped with hair dryer, iron and ironing board, plus the little soaps and shampoos you love to sample. The A/C worked continuesly which is important to me for uninterupted sleep. The staff did an excellent job of checking us in and out and keeping our room clean. One of the best values in OC. I would recommend this motel to everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Not worth the bother!”
Reviews.Author: buckeyewayne
Reviews.Content: Stayed there one night this spring which happened to be during Classic Cruising car weekend. ONE GREAT BIG MISTAKE! the entire weekend, they used Coastal highway (right next to the hotel) as a drag strip and were racing loud car engines until 3AM. This establishment has 2 buildings which are both rather old and dated. The back building is horrible, the rooms are small and are badly in need of updating. The front building is a little better but do not get put into a room close to the highway, the noise level is quite noticeable, if you are a light sleeper. On the positive side the staff is friendly enough, and the little restaurant enclosed in the main building on the corner has good basic food and prices are good. Overall this place is not a good value for the money and should only be your choice if nothing else is available.

Reviews.Title: “Simple Hotel, Great Location, Friendly Staff.”
Reviews.Author: billykeyc
Reviews.Content: We stayed at The Sea Bay the last 2 summers and we love it. It's a simple place with clean rooms, a great location, easy walk to the beach, easy walk to the "bar-muda triangle" (Fagers, Mackys, & Seacrets) The west building is older but the bay side windows overlook the bay right at the route 90 bridge (just up the street from Fagers Island). We love this location although you do hear the bar crowd walking home at last call :-) A decent amount of 18-25 year olds stay hear as well so beware of occasional late night noise. We had a great relaxing time. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The only bummer was that Tuby's (sub shop accross the street closed for good). Call Billy's Sub Shop and they'll deliver right to the beach, you can pick up a menu in the lobby. 2 small outdoor pools, on site restaurant with a decent breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: chriskim2000
Reviews.Content: This was my first visit to the Sea Bay and I'll definitely stay again. The beach is right across the street and only took a couple of minutes to walk to. The staff was very friendly and anytime we asked for something (extra coffee and towels) it was delivered to us within minutes! The inside and the grounds were both very clean and the pool was salt water which was AMAZING! We went to their restaurant every morning for breakfast and loved it. Best chipped beef gravy I've ever had!

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful View for Affordable Price”
Reviews.Author: pugm0m
Reviews.Content: We stayed for three nights and booked at the last moment for weekend trip. We did not want to pay high price for hotels on the beach and usually like to stay in a quiet spot and walk or drive to the beach for the day. The only thing that open was a room in the west building with a "bayview" that was $30 more per night than the one we wanted in the main building. We were so happy that we paid the extra 30 bucks and had the bayview because it was so peaceful waking up with a view of the bay and ducks and geese. The view from the balconies is the same one they show on the website and it is very beautiful. (The main building views were of the parking lot or street.) The west building also has a small lobby/lounge area and its own pool seperate from the main building which was very cozy. Beds were comfortable and refrigerator large. We had a small table with two chairs and ate lunches in our room. If you book through the seabay website and click on the special page first before you look at available rooms, you can select different specials they offer. We selected the $8.00 off coupon per adult per night for the sea bay cafe. We enjoyed breakfast there each morning and the food was very good and reasonably priced. The only drawback is that the hotel is on a busy intersection and crossing the street to go the beach is not as easy ,but we usually drive down to the beach area anyway and enjoy staying close to the action but in a quiet spot. We would stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect location, wonderful staff, I want to go back”
Reviews.Author: NewAARPmember
Reviews.Content: I booked a bayfront room at the last minute after I saw I could take off work on a couple weekdays. Hotel was purchased by new people in 2007, and their hardwork on upgrades shows. Front desk staff was pleasant despite full-house mayhem. My room seemed freshly painted, with clean carpets, and new micro-frig. Both appliances worked very well, which is surprising these days! Bathroom was spotless, and the room was quite spacious. I have a bad back, and was pleasantly surprised both mornings when I woke up with no back pain. Room AC was in perfect working order. Lobbies and stairwells were nicely furnished, and also immaculate. Every member of the staff had time for a smile and a greeting. Parking was plentiful for guests. Wifi worked fine in my room, once I stopped being dense and restarted my browser. Pool area was nicely furnished with chairs and chaises; I had a pool view from my deck and watched the care that the staff pool engineer put into in each throrough morning cleaning. A gorgeous bay view made for quiet mornings watching egrets, herons, ducks, geese, and orioles, as well as sailboarders and free stunning sunsets. I experienced no noise from the kids except for what's to be expected during normal pool hours, however, my room was next to the elevator and the mechanical noise took a bit of getting used to. I'm picky about noise, and don't watch alot of TV, so that would probably block it out. There was certainly a good selection of channels to chose from! The Sea Bay Cafe, open for breakfast and lunch, was also immaculate and staffed with wonderful people. I enjoyed meals there, and wish they were open for dinner! Within walking distance - 7-11 (one block north) JR's Ribs (across Rt 1, mediocre) Dead Freddy's, overpriced and LOUD and then always awesome and affordable Five Guys (both 2 blocks south.) One block and through the dunes to the wide beach made for an easy tote of too much gear. I will definately stay at Sea Bay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Friendly Staff”
Reviews.Author: HappyTravlr18
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sea Bay Hotel in June for a friends getaway. The hotel is right across the street from the beach and walking distance to restaurants. It was easy to park and parking was free. There was a small glitch with our room, but it was taken care of immediately. The staff is friendly and helpful. We definitely enjoyed the breakfast at the hotel. I usually stay at Hiltons, but I plan to stay here again and have recommended it to friends.

Reviews.Title: “Great location at reasonable price!”
Reviews.Author: Kleintop
Reviews.Content: My family really enjoyed our stay! We were here last year too. This is definitely a great place to stay at a good price!! Thanks Sea Bay see ya next year!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great weekend! The hotel was awesome!”
Reviews.Author: UR10s
Reviews.Content: The hotel was very nice and very easy to get to once you enter Ocean City, MD. The staff was very nice and always had a smile on their face! Great views of the bay and two nice pools. Definitely worth your visit!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay in OCMD”
Reviews.Author: jcolbyschneider
Reviews.Content: This was my 3rd trip back to the Sea Bay Hotel, and again I had a great time. The staff is always very friendly and it's awesome being able to wake up and have the Sea Bay Cafe right there (and open late for breakfast for us late sleepers). We went to Fager's Island both nights...the crew I was with was pretty pumped that you only had to go a block to hang out at one of the best bars in OC. Will be back next year. Thanks again!

Reviews.Title: “My go-to hotel...wouldn't stay anywhere else”
Reviews.Author: dgorman
Reviews.Content: This was probably my fifth time staying at the Sea Bay and each time the experience has been fantastic. Great rates, spotless rooms, outstanding service and a prime location. I can't say enough about the hotel and highly recommend staying there when you're in twon.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly and clean. The staff was very helpful.”
Reviews.Author: golfman_11
Reviews.Content: Was here in March 2011 for a golf package. Was wondering if you are running any specials in October? Would like to hear from you if you are. Thank you Jack Laumeister

Reviews.Title: “Cared For Hotel at a Reasonable Price in a Good Location”
Reviews.Author: czang76
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel with my husband and 3 boys (ages 3, 8 and 10) after reading the positive reviews on Trip Advisor. I have stayed at some higher priced dumps in Ocean City, so I was happy to see a clean, cared for hotel upon arrival. We stayed in the bay front building June 26-Jul. 1 in a double/double/sofa bed room. (Finding affordable hotel accommodations that sleep 5 is another challenge in OC.) The staff works hard and goes out of their way to make sure you are having a pleasant experience. The pools and common areas are cleaned every morning. The maids ask if you have any specific needs. I called the front desk because the floor above us was being loud and rowdy after midnight, and security was immediately sent to the room to quiet them down. This was the first time we stayed off of the boardwalk (saving $100 per night), and we had no problems with the location. The bay view was beautiful, many restaurants and shops are in walking distance, and my kids loved the fact that there were two (uncrowded) pools. Also, the parking lot had plenty of room so you did not have to worry about losing your "perfect" space if you drove somewhere. The beach was only a block away, and I will say that the traffic from the Rt. 90 bridge makes it a little tricky to cross the highway with kids, but not unbearably so. The building is not brand new, but they are not charging like it is the Hilton, so I was not expecting brand new facilities. Everything is clean and in working order, and that is what mattered to me. I would highly recommend the Sea Bay if you are on a budget and looking for an affordable getaway in Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay is wonderful!”
Reviews.Author: MLMKBurton
Reviews.Content: Sea Bay, located on the bay side of Ocean City, is a very welcoming place. The staff couldn't have been more accommodating and helpful. They truly want your experience to be pleasant and memorable. Definitely took advantage of the Cafe, conveniently located on the first floor. Their outside pool was extremely clean, and having that option was a real bonus. My room was quite spacious and comfortable. I had no problem sleeping at all. If you want relaxing, clean, inviting, friendly, and convenient, I thoroughly recommend Sea Breeze. I know I'll be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Haven't had this great of a stay in a while!”
Reviews.Author: beastegrl2
Reviews.Content: When I tell you the staff was beyond accommodating, that isn't an exaggeration. I first called a few weeks in advance and needed to switch the days of my stay and was greeted on the phone with someone who was super nice, I had absolutely no trouble changing the dates of my stay, and I even got an email confirmation right away! This was setting me up for a great experience. This was maybe one of the cleanest yet affordable hotels I have stayed at hands down in a beach town. The room was spotless, the common areas were not sketchy at all, and it was nice to see them even cleaning the lobby during mid-day on a weekend. Our room was HUGE. We stayed in the east building, which didn't face the bayfront. I could have done without the children running up and down the hallway screaming day in and out but that's not the fault of the hotel - that's the ongoing fault of parents for never watching their children (a countrywide phenomenon lately). No matter where I go this is the norm, children like caged animals screaming. What's new. That's likely the only bad part of the whole stay. When the air conditioner was on, they were drowned out anyway. The shower had great water pressure, clean room, huge room, wonderful balcony, air conditioner was on upon entering the hotel, the air conditioner worked great, comfortable bed, etc. At night, their security guard is an off-duty state trooper. FANTASTIC to see. Especially since there is so much riff-raff that hangs around Ocean City (especially on the weekend we went, "senior week" filled with screaming drunk 17 year olds), they definitely keep it safe for everyone. Don't bother going out anywhere for breakfast when you can just go downstairs to the cafe. Great food, great service. It's tough to screw up eggs, and their bacon was crisp and delicious. Sure, "General's Kitchen" may have the best creamed chipped beef, but, when you want to just eat so you can go to the beach, why bother traveling? Everything you need is right here. Great distance to all the bars and nightlife. A really nice walk to Fager's Island (five minutes or less). All in all, I will be returning.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel for a Nice price”
Reviews.Author: snydsey
Reviews.Content: I stayed at SeaBay with a couple friends. I've been to Ocean City a couple times before and each time stayed at a different place. While this one was not my favorite, its still towards the top of the list. LOCATION- Not exactly in the center, but pretty close. There's plenty of things to do nearby, so no problem with that. ROOMS- Not the largest rooms, but very nice. Well kept. The balcony is reletively large too, and the bathroom is nice as well. The beds are about average in comfortableness. [not a word (: PRICE- Definetly worth it. Not a bad price at all. STAFF- They were nice overall. Pretty welcoming, we didn't have too much interaction, so not much to say, but they seemed nice. POOL- This dissappointed me, but we're at the beach so its really not a big deal. There is two pools, but they are both relatively small, that didn't bother me that much though as we are at the ocean! OVERAL- I highly recommend this place if you want a decent place to stay for a couple nights without having to pay too much. Not a resort of any kind, but definetly not a scummy motel either. One complaint is that the wi-fi didn't always work in the room, that was disapointing at night. We are returning this upcoming summer.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: gypsy023
Reviews.Content: My friends and I went to Ocean City for Memorial Weekend and had a great stay at this hotel. The hotel was clean, the cafe served breakfast and lunch and is close to the beach and shopping. The staff is very helpful especially Seana and Alexis. We are making plans to stay again next year. We highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Sea Bay is a wonderful Ocean City, Md choice.”
Reviews.Author: kschuck21
Reviews.Content: My mother and I enjoyed our stay at Sea Bay while visiting Ocean City, Md. Its conveniently located, has a friendly staff, is clean and very comfortable. This was our second stay. We would highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Had a great stay at the Sea Bay!”
Reviews.Author: eric41365
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this property for any vacationer. The location is great being near lots of great restaurants and in the heart of oc,md. My stay was quiet, clean and comfortable. II also had an excellent breakfast at their on premise restaurant.

Reviews.Title: “Decent clean Hotel in Good Location”
Reviews.Author: kdhgreen
Reviews.Content: I stayed one night last weekend with a friend as we decided to hang out in OC one night and hang out at Seacrets and Fagers Island. The hotel is in a good location close to Fagers Island which is a nice relaxing place to just eat, watch the sunset, listen to live music and drink. The room itself was very clean, the bed sheets were clean and the bed and pillows were suprisingly comfortable. We had a view of the bay which was nice. the only drawback to the hotel was that they had two fraternities and the MSO staying that weekend and those people were crazy loud all night. I was calling the front desk at 3:50 am to get them to quiet the partiers down but it still went on for another good hour. Other than that the hotel was nice and the price was good.

Reviews.Title: “Great, Friendly hotel!”
Reviews.Author: blondie0088
Reviews.Content: We just returned from our stay at the Sea Bay. I went with a group that my fiancee's family is in. We rented an entire floor for 2 nights and got a great rate. The lobby was a nice updated area.They have an ice maker and even a few games. I was genuinely surprised by how clean the room was. No funky odors, no dirt stained tub or shower curtain, & clean towels. I really liked the big fridge and the ironing board and iron they provided. That comes in Handy! They even provide you with some coffee, coffee maker and cups which I thought was great. There was nothing spectacular, but when you stay at hotels in Ocean City sometimes you never know what you're going to get. I have only 2 complaints, The walls here must be made of paper. You can hear EVERYTHING, and I mean EVERYTHING. Someone can be whispering in the hallway and you would hear it through the door. There was plenty of times I was woken up during the night thinking someone was knocking on our door only to realize they were knocking on the door 4 doors down from mine! we also weren't 100% thrilled with the location, it's bay side but you really have an obstructed view of the Bay. The balconies are facing the roads, not the bay, and they are not very large. I can say it's really close to all the best bars. about 2 blocks up from Fager's Island and we were able to walk. I should say though that we always typically stay Ocean Front and no further up then 30th street.( so maybe I'm being a bit judgemental) They also have a little Cafe here that has THE BEST chip beef gravy I have EVER had. The prices are reasonable, fast friendly service and just an overall great experience. I will put this Cafe on my list of must visit places while I am staying in Ocean City! If our group continued to stay here yearly I would be happy. I recommend the Sea Bay to anyone!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, excellent staff, highly recommend the Sea Bay Hotel”
Reviews.Author: dctravel9
Reviews.Content: We used the conference room for an event and stayed in the hotel as well. The staff was very helpful and pleasant, and the rooms were clean and spacious. Highly recommend the Sea Bay to anyone traveling to Ocean City.

Reviews.Title: “Annual Trip at Sea Bay - Another Great Weekend”
Reviews.Author: jcolbyschneider
Reviews.Content: This year was our groups 2nd annual Fantasy Baseball Draft / Golf trip and it was an awesome weekend again. We worked with the staff before we got down to secure a conference room for that Saturday...and they were able to get us good rates and tee-times for our golf outing. Really helpful. Another huge perk, like last year, is the Sea Bay Cafe. Great breakfasts both mornings. I suggest the Crab Omelette - really good stuff. A big thanks to the staff for another great weekend. We'll definitely see you again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and friendly staff. Great location.”
Reviews.Author: eugene000
Reviews.Content: Great hotel. Wonderful spacious rooms. Clean rooms and friendly staff. Love the location - near everything, shopping, restaurants, amusements, beach and boardwalk. Great for families with kids.

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommend!”
Reviews.Author: MDBarbara
Reviews.Content: It's not the Hilton BUT it's very clean, very comfortable and the employees could not be any nicer. The location is perfect. I'm fussy about a clean hotel room and comfortable beds. The Sea Bay has both! The rooms are very large and has everything you need for a comfortable stay. I'll be back!

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Safe, Comfortable and well taken care of.”
Reviews.Author: beach_bum_wannabe_10
Reviews.Content: We felt safe, comfortable, and well taken care of. Any and all questions were answered by staff with curtesy and respect. We enjoyed our family vacation at the beach with you. The Cafe food and staff were enjoyable. We also had our young adult daughter with us.We just wanted an affordable hotel so we could enjoy a few days at the beach and this hotel was an excellent choice for us. We were highly satisfied.

Reviews.Title: “What a nice surprise!”
Reviews.Author: jas7437
Reviews.Content: Very pleasantly surprised! Large room, very clean. Staff was very friendly and professional. Great location too. Wish these hotels would stop using creepy nylon bedspreads, but all in all very happy with our stay. The room rate was VERY reasonable considering that it was such a busy weekend in OC. The cost does not reflect the quality of the hotel. We'll be back next year.

Reviews.Title: “Nice for the price”
Reviews.Author: audiman7287
Reviews.Content: A few college friends and I were going down to OC for the long labor day weekend. Being on a budget, the Sea Bay seemed to offer what we were looking for. The staff was friendly, the room was clean and large. It was no Ritz Carleton, but it was perfect for sleeping and showering after the beach. We had a balcony overlooking the pool in the main building, but the view was still nice. The location was also good, only a quick drive or bus ride to the boardwalk or Seacrets. There were also many other young (20's) hotel guests having a good time, which gave it a good atmosphere. Overall I would recommend the Sea Bay to anybody looking for an affordable place to rest their head in OC.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, nice hotel, we'll be back!”
Reviews.Author: 21Roberto
Reviews.Content: After many months of waiting for our 1st trip to Ocean City I must say we were very pleased with our stay at the Sea Bay Hotel. The hotel is exactly 1 block from the beach and has very easy access. You can walk over or drive over and there is free public parking on the side street. The one side street we used had the rinse off station for when you left the beach to wash off a bit before heading back to the hotel or hopping in the car! The rooms are kept very clean by the housekeeping staff. I can agree on some of the other reviews that the carpets are worn and looked dirty, however I am reasonable and know that being in a beach area it has to be exceptionally hard to keep the carpets spotless. The beds were ok. Not the most comfortable we have slept on but they were fine. We had the pull out sofa in our room with a bay view. The bay view was a nice touch and the couch/sofa was comfy. Bathroom was clean, tub had the Bathfitter installed so it was in great shape. The lobby in the "B" building where we stayed had a seating area leading out to the pool area. The pool is a nice touch, perfect size to take a refreshing dip on a hot day. The "A" building lobby was very nice also. Business center with free internet and free printing of anything you wanted. We had a 3 night stay planned and were going to head south for a few more days but with the hurricane Earl coming up the coast elected not to travel into the storm. We inquired about adding an extra day on to our stay and they accomodated it for us at a very nice rate. We did eat at the Sea Bay Cafe for breakfast 1 day. It is a little pricey but the food was good. The free WIFI was nice however the signal was a bit testy at night time. Parking was spacious and the laundry facility was a great added feature as we did a couple loads to eliminate the abundance when we got home!

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel for a very reasonable price!”
Reviews.Author: Irena479
Reviews.Content: We just recently stayed at the Sea Bay, our first trip to Ocean City. It definetley won't be our last. Never knowing what to expect when staying in a new place an hotel, we were pleasantly surprised. The room was pretty basic, but very clean. The free wifi was a nice added bonus. The balcony was a nice feature even though it faced the parking lot. It was very quiet, and a distance from all the noise of the boardwalk. The cafe was very nice, with good food and great, friendly service. The pool in the back of our building, Building B, is a little small,but has a beautiful view of the bay. It would have been nice if their was a hot tub, and an exercise room. They tell you about this gym very close by, but it is closed and the number is disconnected. Overall, the staff was very friendly, even in passing. However, upon checking out, one girl with dark hair and glasses was very rude and nasty. You could tell she was having a bad day. But we had a great stay at the sea bay, and you couldn't beat the price or the location. It is very close to the beach which is nice. There are a few overpriced buffets, but Dead Freddies was a favorite of ours. Mackey's has a great view and you can eat dinner steps away from the bay, the food was okay. The buffets, Hall's and a few other places just seemed overpriced. We ordered pizza from Johnnie's Pizza, and it was very good and reasonable. If you care to take a drive, you, can't beat the food or view from Hooper's. It is also a very safe clean city which was a nice and comforting surprise.

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay, affordable price, terrific service!!!”
Reviews.Author: phenomenalkitty
Reviews.Content: I usually don't write reviews of the hotels I stay in because most of the ones I stay in are nothing special, however I had a really positive experience with this hotel. First of all, I agree with the other reviewers that this hotel is in a terrific location (close to the beach and to good night-spots while being a good distance from the downtown craziness) and they offer rooms at a relatively affordable to rate when compared other hotels in the area. Now, an example of the great service at this hotel. I had the unfortunate experience of being in a room next to a bunch of obnoxious and noisy neighbors (screaming. . . and yelling. . . and cursing into the wee hours) and it was getting to the point where I was losing sleep and my trip was on the verge of being ruined. I decided to try and get my room changed and the front desk employee was sooo understanding (despite the fact that they were on the verge of being fully booked) and switched my room no questions asked. In fact they actually upgraded my room to a bayfront view and delivered the key straight personally to my room within 15 minutes of my original call!! A bad situation made good by the staff at Sea Bay!!! So, I definitely recommend this hotel if you are on a budget but still desire a clean comfortable room with good service by the staff. Too bad we can't always choose who is staying in the room next to us!

Reviews.Title: “Great Price Perfect location”
Reviews.Author: ToesNdeSand
Reviews.Content: You can't beat the price for the Seabay nor the location. It is close enough to Fagers that a five minute walk is all it takes. It is even close enough to walk to Seacrets or Mackys. I have stayed here many times with friends on our girls weekends. The stay has always been quite accomodating and friendly. They even allow for a late check out if needed. I use this one quite often.

Reviews.Title: “A great deal in an overpriced market”
Reviews.Author: cherryiice
Reviews.Content: I was very impressed with my stay at the Sea Bay hotel this summer. After doing a lot of research, I determined that the Sea Bay was by far the best choice within our price range. And I was not disappointed. I stayed in the Kings Arms Motel in 2009 and paid about $40 less per night for that crap hole place. The Sea Bay is not perfect, but its a nice hotel and it met all of my expectations. When I made our reservations, I got a deal for a free breakfast for both myself and my boyfriend for each night that we stayed. The free breakfast actually turned out to be an $8 voucher per person for use in the new hotel cafe. I was impressed with the quality of the food at the cafe (the fresh fruit was actually fresh!) and while we went over our $8 vouchers both days, you can easily get a decent breakfast while staying within those limits. Another concern I had when booking was the actual quality of the rooms. I knew that the hotel had two buildings, and that we had booked in the slightly older building, building B. A lot of times hotels will only show photos of their nicer rooms, leading to disappointment when you realize that these are not the rooms you booked. But our room was just as nice as the rooms in the photos and the only complaint I can make is that it was slightly smaller than expected. The staff was very friendly, and there was always someone at the desk in case of any late night issues. I loved that there were two pools, although both were small, it was nice to have a choice. My only real complaint would be the quality of the sheets, they were definitely some of the rougher sheets I've encountered in a hotel. Overall, I was very impressed with my stay at Sea Bay Hotel, and I look forward to staying there in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely Wonderful!!”
Reviews.Author: leannposche
Reviews.Content: The Sea Bay Hotel is a great place to stay whether your traveling alone or with family and friends! The location is far enough away from the hustle and bustle of downtown, yet so close to everything else. Within walking distance to Fagers Island and Dead Freddie's...and only across the street from the beach! We stayed in the main building (2 buildings) and the front desk staff was the best I've ever had at any hotel! Johnathan and Alexis were extremely nice and always gave us anything we needed. Every day one of the two of them were working and they would always smile at me when I came up to the desk and be more than happy to start a conversation. Greeting someone with a smile is something that people don't forget. Some places I have stayed get so tired of answering the same questions over and over again but everyday they told us something different we could do while in Ocean City. Our housekeeper was wonderful! His name was Dorcel and everyday we would see him in the hallways on our way out for the day. He was always pleasant and said hello to us with a smile every time we saw him. Everyone in that hotel was so nice and helpful. We had such a pleasant stay at the Sea Bay which was a great experience for our first trip to Ocean City. This will be the place we stay whenever we vacation to Ocean City. If your looking for friendly staff and people who can answer any question you have, you must stay here!

Reviews.Title: “Perfect for the price”
Reviews.Author: mjmm1
Reviews.Content: This was our first vacation at this hotel. The hotel was fine, nothing special, but for the price you could not beat it. We had the two double beds and pull out couch.The pull out was a little uncomfortble.Only two minutes from the beach was a plus for our family .Everyone was VERY friendly and the front desk was more than helpfull! Hope to return next year!

Reviews.Title: “Overall, not bad”
Reviews.Author: leelee2946
Reviews.Content: Overall, our stay was not bad at all. I was down for a sorority reunion and many of my sisters, including myself, stayed here. Housekeeping was friendly and was prompt. You also cannot beat the location. My only upset is service I received at the front desk. I got down to the hotel very late due to work and the drive. After a little bit of confusion with my room (which was not due to the hotel at all) I went to the front desk to get a key. There was a young man on the phone and a young woman (shorter, with glasses) just sitting there. I stood there for a while waiting to be helped. The girl at the desk just sat and stared at me! Not a "hello" or "can I help you?"... just sat and stared at me as if I was going to destroy her day. She literally had to get up and help the boy on the phone with a reservation, sat back down, and still did not acknowledge me. Finally, the boy on the phone handed me a key. Even if she was not front desk (which is stretching it) she could have acknowledged my existence. I work for a large hotel near the airport and I can understand that it can be a long day, especially when it is busy, but I would never just let a customer stand there and just stare at them, and not even attempt to help them. Very unprofessional. I would recommend this hotel to other travels, but will keep my fingers crossed that after your hours of travel, that you do not come into contact with this very unfriendly and unhelpful girl.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay”
Reviews.Author: ocbeach9
Reviews.Content: Having taken my granddaughters every year to a beach/hotel, this was the cleanest and most pleasant place we've stayed. All of the personnel who work there had a smile and were very nice to us and the rest of the guests all week. The restaurant has great food and their waitresses were also pleasant and accommodating. The pool was always clean. If you needed directions and the person you asked didn't know where to find something they found it for you. There's a lot to do in Ocean City and it's close to the outlets and Asateaque Island where the girls thoroughly enjoyed watching the horses; the boardwalk with it's games and rides; and the food - smorgasbord and eating on the bay watching the water under their feet.

Reviews.Title: “Decent beach location.”
Reviews.Author: godjess76
Reviews.Content: This location is only a block away from the beach, and a convenient drive to the boardwalk. The room was large enough to house my family, and had a microwave and refrigerator. This was great for breakfast/lunches, and leftovers. The one bed was in the direct line of the air conditioner vent. If you enjoy cold, this will be great for you! When we arrived our room was nice and clean, but I think there was some neglect in the sweeping as the week progressed. Staff was always friendly. As I said earlier, the walk to the beach is about a block, but you need to cross the intercoastal highway (must use the crosswalks). There are several stores and restaurants within walking distance. The view of the bay from the rear of the main building was lovely. All-in-all this was a convenient, clean, and affordable hotel for an Ocean City, MD. vacation.

Reviews.Title: “Decent Experience”
Reviews.Author: Traveler_424
Reviews.Content: The hotel could benefit from being updated, and it isn't the cleanest, but I did have a decent experience. The sofa's pullout mattress was hanging in one of the corners, from what I assume was broken springs. However, the room had a great balcony and view, as well as a friendly staff!

Reviews.Title: “Not so great”
Reviews.Author: Italynstallyn44
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a night with my wife last week. I'm not sure if it was because we were in the "B" building or not, but we did not have an experience like many other reviewers. Were were in room 142 of the "B" building which was very old and dated. The sliding door to the balcony did not close all the way. The bathroom was really showing signs of wear. The slide lock on the door had been busted off, it was made of a cheaper metal. To top it off the sheets/pillowcases that were on the bed had hair on them. We called down to request new sheets which arrived pretty quick but the new ones also had hair on them. We ended up using our own sheets that we brought. On a positive note, the hotel is in a good location and the breakfast cafe in the hotel was pretty good. I had a crab omlette that was very good and the waitress was nice.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: WombatPr1de
Reviews.Content: I stayed at the Sea Bay last week and had a great experience all around. Nothing too fancy, but the price was great, the room was clean, the service was good, the restaurant in the lobby had great breakfast, it's close to everything... I really have nothing bad to say. I would definitely stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Repeat customer, nice room, good value, central location.”
Reviews.Author: erm295
Reviews.Content: As a repeat customer we had a very nice room with the regular ammenities in the room making it comfortable for all of us. I have read some other reviews saying that the stay for them was not so good we have never had that problem in our stays at their hotel. The location is good for going to Delaware or to the inlet area for boardwalk activities. The staff we have met have all been helpful and friendly with the exception of of one.(maybe having a bad day??). I guess we will find out next time. The cafe is nice, food is good, cost is moderate. The one thing we did miss on this years stay was the morning coffee in the lobby, even though there is a single cup coffee maker in the room. (just not the same). Overall we will return and do recommend the hotel to others.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, neat rooms, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: whiskers12314
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at the Sea Bay Hotel in Ocean City Maryland for nine years now. The rooms are always clean, neat and well supplied.
